text: The dutch government does not have a winner takes all system but a multi party system where each party gets seats in the parliament equal to the percentage of votes. This means almost always that compromises and working together with different political parties is needed. Its a system that helps a bit against polarization and ignoring minorities. Not saying its perfect though
